152.content:
Beatrixo had just finished putting away her cooking utensils when she heard a knock on the door.

She went to answer it and standing on her doorstep was Betty, who was visiting for the weekend.

"Oh, hello, Betty!"

"Hello, Grandma!" Betty said as she embraced Beatrixo in a hug, enjoying the soothing smell of her perfume.

"You came just in time. I just finished baking a nice snack for us."
152.title: Betty and Beatrixo

choices: ...an alien makes the vegetables super fattening.
...Betty decides to sneak a drink straight from the udder.
154.content:
Betty and Paloma had decided to stay at Beatrixo's farm over the weekend.

They had to help out with the chores while staying there, but they didn't mind.

Betty was milking a cow, Paloma was collecting eggs, and Beatrixo was picking vegetables.

Suddenly...
154.title: Visiting Beatrixo's farm

choices: ...the sexual imagery (long pink things, white liquid, etc.) makes her horny.
Betty's fat cells start to multiply rapidly
...Betty starts transforming into a fat cow girl.
1543.content:
Betty was getting thirsty.

She decided it couldn't hurt to take a little drink, getting under one of the cows and aiming an udder toward her mouth.

She squeezed and tugged on the udder, shooting a little stream of milk into her mouth.

"Mmmm... Delicious." she moaned, licking a drop of milk from her bottom lip.

"Aha! Busted!" Beatrixo cried, spying on her from the barn door.

"Granny! I-I'm sorry... I..."

"Oh, it's okay, Betty. You can drink all you want. In fact, let me help..."

Beatrixo gripped the cow's udders and aimed them at Betty's mouth.

Beatrixo fills her so full of milk...
1543.title: ...Betty decides to sneak a drink straight from...

15433.content:
With every drop that went down her throat, Betty was changing. First, she began to grow a tail over her butt and she grew a snout. Next, an udder began to grow over her waist and flopped out of her pants. Soon, she grew a second pair of breasts that begin to fill with milk along with her original pair. As this occured, her belly began to grow bigger and her waist began to get wider.

As Betty licks the milk off her lips, she finally realizes the changes that happened to her and she...
15433.title: ...Betty starts transforming into a fat cow girl.

Their metabolisms and cravings were altered.
1551.content:
"Betty! It's time to go." yelled Betty's mother.

Betty only sighed as she came down the stairs towards her mother. As usual, her mother was forcing her to act less like a tomboy, whether Betty wanted to or not. This time her mother was taking Betty to a fancy new restaurant in town to learn proper table manners. She even made Betty where a silly pink dress.

"Mom. Do I have to go to this place? It's the kind of place snobby rich people like Penelope go to eat."

"Oh Betty, I sure you'll love it there once you try the food. Plus you'll learn some proper etiquette while we're there."

Betty continued to beg and whine, but her mother was determined to bring her to the restaurant.

Meanwhile, the fancy restaurant where Betty and her mother were going to had re net hired a new employee. It was none other than Betty's friend and fellow Galactic Guardian, Sparky. He had gained the job as a waiter to earn some extra cash.

When Betty and her mother arrived, Betty was happy to see a familiar face. Betty and her mother both ordered for some steak, and Sparky went into the kitchen to fetch the order. However before he took it over to them he decided to give it a taste test. He took a tiny bite, and wasn't pleased with the flavor. It was surprisingly bland, but Sparky had some special Neutropian spice that he thought would help.

He gave them their meal without realizing that the spice would affect humans. Once Betty and her mom started eating the food...
1551.title: Betty and her mom
